definition: to stay away from home/residence abroad/sojourn
trip/travel/to travel/brigade (army)
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
surname Ju
motorhome/RV (recreational vehicle)

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他与太太得灵及他们的2个孩子目前旅居在德国。

sentences.english: Many overseas Chinese living abroad, is a famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 旅居海外华侨众多，是个著名侨乡。

sentences.english: At the end of 2001, I moved to Shanghai to be a career artist and free writer.
sentences.chinese: 2001年末旅居上海做职业画家与自由撰稿人。

sentences.english: It describes in great detail the author's 17 years 1275 - 1292) of life in China.
sentences.chinese: 它详细描写了作者旅居中国17年的生活。

sentences.english: In her eyes was shown her anxiety about her daughter who is living overseas.
sentences.chinese: 她眼中流露出对她的旅居海外的女儿的忧虑。

sentences.english: Snowflake of 15 years old, the maternal aunt that is resided abroad is received.
sentences.chinese: 十五岁的雪花，被旅居海外的姨妈接走。

sentences.english: For many years he had lived beyond the sea(s).
For Americans, traveling abroad to start over is becoming increasingly common.
sentences.chinese: 对于美国人来说，旅居海外以从新开始变得很正常。

sentences.english: He is wildlife photographer Hank Tseng (Tseng Chiu-wen), who currently lives in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 他就是旅居加拿大的生态摄影家曾秋文。

sentences.english: At present I am a sojourner in civilized life again.
sentences.chinese: 目前我又成了文明生活的旅居者。

sentences.english: When a country changes things, the diaspora can be the last to know.
sentences.chinese: 一个国家在改变，旅居国外的人总是最后知道的。

sentences.english: There are trade-offs to being an expat.
sentences.chinese: 旅居国外也是有得有失。

sentences.english: Yo-Yo Ma was born in 1955 to Chinese parents living in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 马友友出生于1955年，父母是旅居巴黎的中国人。

sentences.english: Gibran is an Arabian painter and writer residing U. S. A at the turn of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 纪伯伦是20世纪之交旅居美国的阿拉伯画家和作家。

definition: to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence
to migrate/to move to a new place of residence
to study away from home or abroad (old)
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to study abroad
to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation
trip/journey/tourism/travel/tour/to travel
small town
to settle down/to set up a home
small town/village
to get well/to heal/to recuperate/to convalesce/convalescence/to nurse
livable
to immigrate/to migrate/emigrant/immigrant
the whole family
long-term resident/permanent residence/eternalism (permanence of soul, Sanskrit śāśvata-vāda)
to check in (at a hotel etc)
